overview: When Kristen Scott and Lana Rhoades look at each other and giggle, it only takes a moment of hesitation before their lips lock in an embrace. It seems that something has been building between them for months. After coming home from a bad date, stepsister Amara Romani promises to show Lilly Lit how to truly enjoy sex. All that kissing and sexy talk is giving her the tingles. Kenna James and Tara Morgan share thoughts on what type of fun they could have once the prom is over. Knowing that their boyfriends are no longer in the picture, they both wanted to get laid. Kenna has an idea... they can have their own fun.
title: I Know a Kinky Game
